title: For Sale : N48 A&G Girls BB Reprint Sets

posts.post_title: For Sale : N48 A&G Girls BB Reprint Sets
posts.post_content:
$6.00 postpaid.  Made by Murraycards in the UK.  Nice sets of all (9) players, noted as reprints on blank back at the bottom.  Great visual representation of what is a tough set to complete.  A few sets available......email to confirm.  Paypal Gift to [url]autograp@gmail.com[/url].
